ground_truth_reviews.comment: This implementation allows a post to be cancelled regardless of its current state. According to the business rules, we should only be able to cancel a post if it's in a 'pending' or 'confirmed' status. We need to add a check here to validate the post's status before allowing the cancellation.

title: feat: Implement post cancellation logic
body: This change introduces the ability to cancel a post. It adds a new `cancel_post` method to the `PostService` which sets the post's status to 'cancelled'. See https://github.com/Reviewate/benchmark/issues/66
